entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , St. John's
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:52 PM NST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -5.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. John's Int'l Airport 4:30 PM NST Friday 30 December 2022
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -5.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -8.4°C
Wind: W 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 5 except minus 9 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 5 except minus 9 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 11 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Rain showers or flurries. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning early in the morning then changing to rain showers in the morning and ending in the afternoon. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 30 December 2022
